fields.title: Personal Portfolio Website
fields.short_description: A minimalist and fully responsive portfolio showcasing my skills and projects.
fields.content:
## Overview
This project highlights my personal achievements and showcases my skills in web development.

## Features
- Built with Django and Python
- Styled using TailwindCSS
- Fully responsive

![Portfolio Screenshot](https://res.cloudinary.com/demo/image/upload/sample.jpg)

## Technologies Used
Python, Django, TailwindCSS.
fields.meta_description: A minimalist and fully responsive portfolio showcasing my skills and projects.
fields.meta_keywords: portfolio, django, web development, responsive design

fields.title: E-commerce Platform
fields.short_description: An e-commerce platform with user authentication and payment integration.
fields.content:
## Overview
This project is an e-commerce platform built with Django and Python. It features user authentication, payment gateways, and a user-friendly design.

## Features
- Secure authentication
- Payment gateway integration
- Dynamic product listings

![E-commerce Screenshot](https://res.cloudinary.com/demo/image/upload/sample.jpg)

## Technologies Used
Python, Django, Stripe API, Bootstrap.
fields.meta_description: An e-commerce platform with user authentication and payment integration.
fields.meta_keywords: ecommerce, django, payment integration, secure authentication
